side_effects: Updates fields on an equipment classification record.
validation_notes: <id> argument is required. At least one field must be provided to update. mobilization-method must be one of: crew, heavy_equipment_transport, lowboy, itself, trailer. Name must be unique within the same parent. Abbreviation, if provided, must be unique within the same parent. Broker-specific classifications must have a parent.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Must be unique within the same parent when provided.

flags.name: --abbreviation
flags.validation: Must be unique within the same parent when provided.

flags.name: --mobilization-method
flags.validation: Must be one of: crew, heavy_equipment_transport, lowboy, itself, trailer.
